description: '''Potato''' ({{langx|th|โปเตโต้}}) is a [[Thai rock]] [[Musical ensemble|band]] founded in 2001. They released their first album the same year and are known for their versatile music style and lyrics. The band currently has five members including lead vocalist Patchai Pukdesusook, guitarist Teekatas Taviarayakul, bassist Piyawat Anukul, drummer Kan Uamsupan, and keyboardist Kiattiyos Malathong. It has released 8 [[Album|studio albums]], one [[extended play]], and several [[compilation album]]s. It is considered one of the most successful Thai rock bands.
